description: Dichotic Harmony Accords Generator program and other data
README.txt:
Dichotic Harmony Project. Proekt "Dikhoticheskaia Garmoniia".

** Vvedenie.

Dichotic Harmony Project posviashchion sozdaniiu teoreticheskoi bazy i programmnogo
obespecheniia dlia porozhdeniia muzykal'nykh proizvedenii novogo tipa, ispol'zuiushchikh
metod dikhoticheskogo slushaniia kak osnovopolagaiushchii printsip v sovremennom iskusstve
kompozitsii i aranzhirovki, v tom chisle, i preimushchestvenno klassicheskikh muzykal'nykh
proizvedenii.

Kak izvestno, pri razvedenii dvukh garmonicheskikh zvukov po odnomu v kazhdoe ukho
("dikhoticheskoe slushanie") proiskhodit umen'shenie dissonantnosti sozvuchiia.

Dissonantnost' mnogogolosnykh akkordov mozhno umen'shit' tochno takim zhe obrazom,
napravliaia chast' golosov v odno ukho, a ostal'nuiu chast' - v drugoe.
Pri etom "emotsional'noe vzaimodeistvie" razvedionnykh po raznym usham golosov v
znachitel'noi stepeni sokhraniaetsia.

Eto pozvoliaet nadeiat'sia, chto blagodaria dikhoticheskomu slushaniiu mozhno uvelichit'
"blagozvuchnost'" muzykal'nykh proizvedenii s ves'ma slozhnoi garmoniei.

** Ustanovka i rabota.

Dlia ustanovki proekta na PK s OS Windows zapustite fail 2h_setup.exe iz direktorii
setup.
Podrobnoe opisanie proekta nakhoditsia v faile help.txt v direktorii bin.
Vse programmy skompilirovany dlia operatsionnoi sistemy win32.
Iskhodnyi kod testirovalsia na kompiliatorakh MSVC 7 i GCC 4.5.2 (MinGW versiia).

Dostup ko vsem direktoriiam proekta osushchestvliaetsia cherez iarlyk na rabochem stole
"Dichotic Harmony Project".

** Sostav proekta, v poriadke imion (sub)direktorii:

* addons
  .exe ustanovshchik programmy Dichotic Harmony Keyboard
  dokumentatsiia (fail readme.txt)

* arxiv
  .pdf stat'i avtora v arkhive nauchnykh statei arXiv.org

* bin   
  .exe programma Dichotic Harmony Accords Generator (DHAG)
  dokumentatsiia (help.txt)

* bin\accords
  dikhoticheskie demonstatsionnye faily v formate daccords

* midi
  dikhoticheskie demonstatsionnye faily v formate midi
  dokumentatsiia (readme.txt)

* setup
  .exe ustanovshchik proekta Dichotic Harmony Project
  .iss instruktsii dlia sozdaniia proekta v Inno Setup

* src
  iskhodnye teksty programmy DHAG na iazyke C++

* utils
  .exe programma Dichotic Harmony Files Converter (DHFC)
  dokumentatsiia (readme.txt)

** Litsenziia.

Avtor: Vadim Madgazin, Zelenograd, Rossiia. mailto: vadim@vmgames.com

Materialy proekta mozhno svobodno ispol'zovat' dlia oznakomitel'nykh i uchebnykh tselei.
Liuboe drugoe primenenie etikh materialov trebuet otdel'nogo razresheniia avtora.
